channel.title: Portfolios on Saiful Rijal
channel.description: Recent content in Portfolios on Saiful Rijal

item.title: Image Classification with Deep Learning
item.description: Image Classification with Deep Learning (On Progress) Guided project from Udemy: Complete 2020 Data Science & Machine Learning Bootcamp (with a few adjustments) Predict images using the pre-trained model from Keras package (tensorflow.keras.application. Includes image loading, pre-processing, loading models and predicting images. notebook: ‘Pretrained_Image_Classification.ipynb’. Image Classification with CIFAR-10 dataset. Include get the data, pre-processing, build neural network Keras model, visualising learning with Tensorboard (On Progress). notebook: ‘Keras_CIFAR10_Classification.ipynb’. Link to github repsitory

item.title: Build Machine Learning Web App with Streamlit
item.description: Build Machine Learning Web App with Streamlit and Python Guided project from Coursera: Build Machine Learning Web App with Streamlit and Python. In this simple project we are building a machine learning web app. In this web app we can: select a classifier (selecting a model: SVM, Logistic Regression, and Random Forest), adjust the hyperparameter for each classifier, Choose a visualization from the classification metrics. To know how to run python files in streamlit, please refer to the following link.
